news.title: Dublin Simon Community online art auction to kick off next week with contributions from Bono, Gavin Friday, Liam Ó Maonlaí and more
news.summary: The auction takes place from December 5 to 10 and raises funds for those experiencing homelessness across Dublin and beyond.

news.title: Louisa Harland: "I miss the people and the energy of Dublin whenever I'm away from home"
news.summary: Dublin actor Louisa Harland talks to Caroline Kelly about her recent role in The Walsh Sisters, and also reminisces on her hometown, the places she can’t miss when she returns, and why people are the heart of the city’s culture.

news.title: KNEECAP invite fans to join their 10k run in Dublin in aid of the Gaza Food & Play Project
news.summary: You can find the link to donate to the Gaza Food & Play Project below.

news.title: Fontaines D.C. DJs announced for KNEECAP's 3Arena shows
news.summary: Listen to KNEECAP's latest single 'No Comment' below.

news.title: New punk festival TORANN announced for January in Galway
news.summary: The festival will be headlined by Skerries metal group Primordial.

news.title: Saint Etienne announce Dublin date as part of final UK & Ireland tour
news.summary: Tickets will go on sale Friday, December 5 at 10am.

news.title: Peter Kay announces final show in 3Arena in aid of Irish Cancer Society
news.summary: The comedian will perform on April 16, 2026
